page.title: 18Brechin's Industries-1
page.content: The main Industries of our Area are Engineering, the Production of Polypropylene, Whisky Making and the Canning of Fruit and Vegetables. There are 2 Engineering Firms,these being Matrix Engineering and Petersen,Brown and McGill.Matrix manufacture Clutches and Brakes for Industrial use.They employ 185 People and supply British Industry and have Markets Worldwide especially in the U.S.A. Petersen,Brown and McGill a new Firm have a Workforce of 35.They manufacture Oil Field Equipment for an International Market. Don and Low manufacture polypropylene to be used as Carpet Backing for a Worldwide Market excluding U.S.A. They employ 98 people.Polypropylene has replaced the Production of jute.
